stories.headline: RITALIN ROULETTE: State data pinpoints drug use by ZIP code
stories.summary: Mark Skertic investigates the patterns of Ritalin prescription in the Chicago area using data from Illinois' prescription-monitoring program. The analysis reveals that wealthier suburbs show higher concentrations of ADHD medication use among children compared to urban areas.

stories.headline: SPOTLIGHT: CAMPAIGN FINANCE - Covering money, votes and power
stories.summary: Aron Pilhofer discusses the implications of the Bipartisan Campaign Reform Act and provides tips for journalists covering campaign finance. The new law only applies to federal candidates, but state and local committees may become new outlets for soft money.
